Interface ec.ez.prim.Resolver

public interface Resolver
Like the old Distributor or EResult. Resolves the state of a Promise (or other Promise-like Deliverators).

forward(Object)
May deliver accumulated envelopes synchronously during the forward().
smash(Throwable)
Breaks the Promise, reporting 'problem' as the reason.
state()
One of UNRESOLVED, FORWARDED, or BROKEN.
stateName()
Friendlier for EZers.

state 
 public abstract int state()
One of UNRESOLVED, FORWARDED, or BROKEN. May not be KEPT, as that would leak information.

UNRESOLVED => forward()ing and smash()ing are still allowed.

FORWARDED => smash()ing is still allowed.

BROKEN => forward()ing is disallowed and smash()ing will be ignored.

stateName 
 public abstract String stateName()
Friendlier for EZers. One of "UNRESOLVED", "FORWARDED", or "BROKEN"

forward 
 public abstract void forward(Object value)
May deliver accumulated envelopes synchronously during the forward(). To effectively schedule delivery on the end of the run queue, instead schedule delivery of the forward message itself on the end of the run queue.

smash 
 public abstract boolean smash(Throwable problem)
Breaks the Promise, reporting 'problem' as the reason. Afterward is always BROKEN, but returns whether this call broke it.
